ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,
And the stars dispersed,
When the oceans begin to flow,
When the graves are overturned,
Each soul will know what it had sent ahead and what it had left behind.

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
ayas.translation: O man, what seduced you from your munificent Lord
Who created you then formed your symmetry, then gave you right proportion,

ayas.arabic: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
ayas.translation: Shaping you into any form He pleased?
ayas.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratim mā shā-a rakkabak

ayas.translation: Even then you deny the Judgement.
Surely there are guardians over you,
Illustrious scribes
Who know what you do.
The pious will surely be in heaven,
The wicked certainly in Hell:
They will burn in it on the Day of Judgement,
And will not be removed from it.
How can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
ayas.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā yawmud dīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayas.translation: How then can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
ayas.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmud dīn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
ayas.translation: It is the day when no soul will have power to do the least for a soul, and God's alone will be done.
ayas.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsul linafsin shay-ā ۖ wal-amru yawma-idhin lillāh
